sentences.sentence: Promote materialist dialectics and oppose metaphysics and scholasticism.
sentences.translation: 要提倡唯物辩证法，反对形而上学和烦琐哲学。

sentences.sentence: That is one of the dialectics of our era.
sentences.translation: 这也是我们时代的辩证法。

sentences.sentence: This also is us the dialectics of this times.
sentences.translation: 这也是我们这个时代的辩证法。
